```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ws <- read.csv(file = "../data/Datafiniti_Womens_Shoes_Jun19.csv")
ws
```

```{r}
ws %>%
  select(prices.size) %>%
  distinct()
```

```{r}
ws %>%
  # select(prices.size) %>%
  mutate(sizesUS = str_extract(prices.size, "\\d{1,}")) %>%
  filter(!is.na(sizesUS)) -> ws
ws %>%
  distinct(sizesUS) 
# convert Europe sizes to the US sizes
ws %>%
  mutate(sizesUS = recode(sizesUS, "44" = "12",
                                   "43" = "11",
                                   "42" = "11",
                                   "41" = "10", 
                                   "40" = "9",
                                   "39" = "8",
                                   "38" = "7.5",
                                   "37" = "6.5",
                                   "36" = "6",
                                   "35" = "5"
                                   ),
         sizesUS = as.numeric(sizesUS)) -> ws
ws %>%
  arrange(desc(sizesUS)) %>%
  distinct(sizesUS)
```
